top.title: Russian drone slams into block of flats in deadly wave of strikes across Kyiv
top.summary: Six people are killed in Kyiv, and Ukraine targets one of Russia's biggest oil ports on the Black Sea coast.

top.title: BBC apologises to Trump over Panorama edit but refuses to pay compensation
top.summary: Lawyers for the US president have threatened to sue the corporation for $1bn (£759m).

top.title: US calls for international action to cut weapons supply to Sudan paramilitaries
top.summary: "They're committing acts of sexual violence and atrocities," says the US secretary of state, "and it needs to end immediately".

top.title: AI firm claims Chinese spies used its tech to automate cyber attacks
top.summary: The company claimed in a blog post this was the "first reported AI-orchestrated cyber espionage campaign".

top.title: PC gaming giant Valve unveils new console to rival Xbox and PlayStation
top.summary: The Steam Machine is a console designed to allow gamers to play PC games on their TV.

top.title: £220 'for a cut-up sock' - Apple's new iPhone Pocket ridiculed online
top.summary: Many took aim at the high price online, while others made fun of its striking likeness to a piece of footwear.

title.#text: Valve is making microSD cards the next game cartridges
WhatsApp is launching third-party chat integration in Europe
